rdf:Description.dc:title: Curriculum specifications for English 33 1986
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Alberta. Curriculum Branch.
rdf:Description.dc:description: "Curriculum specifications are designed to identify priorities in the Language Arts Program of Studies for the purposes of teaching and evaluation. Evaluation at the provincial level and at the school level should be guided by these specifications."
rdf:Description.dc:subject: English language
English language
Language arts
